Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api

Class HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder
Enclosing class:
HighlightedBlockSpawner
public static class HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder extends Object
The default builder implementation for highlighted blocks.

  • Method Details

    • forPlayer

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder forPlayer(IPlayer player)
      Parameters:
      player - The player who will see the highlighted block.

    • atLocation

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder atLocation(ILocation location)
      Parameters:
      location - The location where the highlighted block will be spawned. This sets the coordinates and the world.

    • inWorld

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder inWorld(IWorld world)
      Parameters:
      world - The world the highlighted block will be spawned in.

    • forDuration

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder forDuration(@Nullable @Nullable Duration duration)
      Parameters:
      duration - The amount of time the highlighted block should exist for after it has been spawned.

    • atPosition

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder atPosition(IVector3D position)
      Parameters:
      position - The position to spawn the highlighted block at. This only sets the coordinates; not the world.

    • atPosition

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder atPosition(double x, double y, double z)
      Sets the x, y, and z coordinates to spawn the highlighted block at.

      Sets the rotation components of the highlighted block.

      Sets the rotation components of the highlighted block.

    • withColor

      public HighlightedBlockSpawner.Builder withColor(Color color)
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the highlighted block.

    • spawn

      public Optional<IHighlightedBlock> spawn()
      Creates and spawns the new highlighted block using the provided configuration.
      Returns:
      The IHighlightedBlock that was spawned. The optional will be empty if it could not be spawned for some reason.
